coreAttributes.name: Boiled Eggs
coreAttributes.description: A small egg box holding four, ready-to-eat, hard-boiled eggs. The top of the box portraits a small and perhaps slightly too ambitious snake trying to swallow an egg whole.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the box and quickly [npc.verb(peel)] one of the eggs before swallowing it #IF(npc.getFaceType().getRace()==RACE_NoStepOnSnek_snake) whole. #ELSE in just a couple bites. #ENDIF [npc.Name] [npc.verb(repeat)] this process a few more times, emptying the box in short order.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the box to offer [npc2.name] some nice eggs in these trying times. [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(take)] and quickly [npc.verb(peel)] one of them before swallowing it #IF(npc2.getFaceType().getRace()==RACE_NoStepOnSnek_snake) whole. #ELSE in just a couple bites. #ENDIF [npc2.Name] then [npc2.verb(repeat)] this process a few more times, emptying the box in short order.
